response.overview: If there's one thing that the guys in Raw Fervor are good at understanding, it's the appetite of their audience for sweet, young, male flesh, which is hereby pitched to perfection with a fine collection of some of the most delightful creatures ever to grace the screen. Lads like Vitali Kutcher, Florian Mraz and Axel Green, whose barely-legal personas will almost certainly send a whole legion of twink fans into five-star ecstasy right from the off with Raw Fervor.  Whether they're playing on their own or teaming up with their like-minded buddies, these gorgeous beauties don't hold back when it comes to the chance of enjoying some filthy twink fun, with a rich volley of fresh spunk soon getting unleashed to leave every one of these boys drenched.
response.title: Raw Fervor
